    • Uses of MarkingColorProvider in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui

      Classes in com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui that implement MarkingColorProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMarkingColorProvider
      The class DefaultMarkingColorProvider can be used to query the Java SDK for the color of a flag.
      class  PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider
      The PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider is a MarkingColorProvider querying the stored MarkingColors of the PluginSettings for the MarkingTypes.

      static Map<MarkingType,MarkingColor> MarkingColorProvider.Util.provideColorsForAllMarkingTypes(MarkingColorProvider colorProvider)
      Provides colors for all marking types.
